Uses of Class
com.chaining.Collector

  • Packages that use Collector 
    Package Description
    com.chaining  
    com.chaining.interfaces  

    • Uses of Collector in com.chaining

      Methods in com.chaining that return Collector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collector<T> Collector.and(T item) 
      Collector<T> Chain.and(T item) 
      <R> Collector<R> Chain.collect(java.lang.Class<R> type)
      collect the stored Iterable item into a Collector Object, if the stored item is not of type Iterable, this method will create a Collector with a List of one item, which is the stored item, you can then invoke and(Object) to append other items to the current items
      <R> Collector<R> Collector.map(io.reactivex.functions.Function<T,R> mapper)
      invoke a mapper function on every item in this Collector

    • Uses of Collector in com.chaining.interfaces

      Methods in com.chaining.interfaces that return Collector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collector<T> And.and(T item)
      add the item to the group of items to be used all together later on
